page.title: 08EAST ALLINGTON C.P. SCHOOL
page.content: East Allington County Primary school consists of 43 children. 20 in the infant class and 24 in the junior class. 22 girls and 22 boys. There are 2.1 teachers including the headmisstres. 28 children have school dinners and the other 14 children have packed lunches. Only one person goes home for lunch. We have one dinner lady who works 1 1/4 hours per day and a server who works 2\hours per day and who serves us our meals.We have a caretaker who comes to clean up every night and works 20 hours per week. We have a secretary who works 7\hours per week.She types letters to parents, does the office work and organizes things.She also helps with camping, trips and games.There are 11 governors (2 parents 1 head 2 minor Authority and 6 Local Education Authority governors).
